37#include <config.h>
38#include "ntp_fp.h"
39#include "ntp_calendar.h"
40#include "parse.h"
41
42void
43gpstolfp(
44 u_int weeks,
45 u_int days,
46 unsigned long seconds,
47 l_fp * lfp
48 )
49{
50 if (weeks < GPSWRAP)
51 {
52 weeks += GPSWEEKS;
53 }
54
55 lfp->l_ui = (uint32_t)(weeks * SECSPERWEEK + days * SECSPERDAY + seconds + GPSORIGIN); /* convert to NTP time */
56 lfp->l_uf = 0;
57}
58
